name: Tyree FORD, a Minor, by and Through his Parent and Guardian, Louise PRINGLE, Respondents, v. PHILADELPHIA HOUSING AUTHORITY, Petitioner

parties: Tyree FORD, a Minor, by and Through his Parent and Guardian, Louise PRINGLE, Respondents, v. PHILADELPHIA HOUSING AUTHORITY, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 30th day of December 2004, we GRANT the Petition for Allowance of Appeal LIMITED to the specific issue of whether a housing authority is a Commonwealth Agency for the purpose of sovereign immunity.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
864 A.2d 1201
Tyree FORD, a Minor, by and Through his Parent and Guardian, Louise PRINGLE, Respondents, v. PHILADELPHIA HOUSING AUTHORITY, Petitioner.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Dec. 30, 2004.
